item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Pentagon Terminates Security Clearance Of Russia Collusion Hoaxer Susan Miller
item.description: Susan Miller, a cheerleader for the Russia collusion hoax, 'cannot be trusted with a security clearance,' a senior administration official says.

item.title: Speech And Self-Defense Keep U.S. From Devolving Into Canada And The U.K.
item.description: These countries demonstrate that the greatest defenses against anarcho-tyranny are the rights to free speech and bearing arms.

item.title: Expect Misleading Headlines About The Big Beautiful Bill Leaving 10 Million Americans ‘Uninsured’
item.description: The idea that this provision would somehow 'increase the uninsured' seems, if not laughable, at least highly speculative.

item.title: Democrats Are Lying to Themselves About Why Their Party Is Collapsing
item.description: Democrats now find themselves in an approval death spiral because their strategy invariably emphasizes style over substance.

item.title: Trump Needs To Protect Americans From Surprise Health Care Bills
item.description: In no other field would customers accept businesses failing to tell buyers a price in advance — or attempting to change that price later.
